Property.name: Force43Menu
Property.HelpText: Force the 4:3 SA2B Main Menu background. (The other disappears on the Main Menu)

Property.name: DisableLogoTweaks
Property.HelpText: Re-Enable the SA2B Intro animation for the original SA2 Menu. (NOTE: Scale will be returned to normal.)

Property.name: DisablePauseTweaks
Property.HelpText: Keep the SA2PC Pause menu. Needed for mods that edit the pause menu.

Property.name: UseOmochaoTutorial
Property.HelpText: Use the Omochao Tutorial. Disable this and the Tutorial button will use SA2PC's How To Play menu instead.

Property.name: 2PStyle
Property.HelpText: Enables the DC 2P Menu. Default depends on the DLC being enabled, see changelog for details.
